prepRequests.text: Pull Q1 revenue numbers and growth metrics
prepRequests.response: Q1 revenue: $3.2M (+34% QoQ). MRR: $1.1M. 142 enterprise customers. NPS: 72.
12 new hires in Q1. VP Eng starts Mar 5. 3 senior engineers onboarded. Headcount: 47.

prepRequests.text: Prepare Series B progress update and key milestones
prepRequests.response: ARR at $12.8M (target $15M by June). Key wins: Helios ($450K), signed 3 enterprise pilots. Product-market fit score: 4.2/5.
